mdRecord.dcterms:title: Hemocytometer
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Adams [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Contained in a leather case. This set includes: tubing with a red stopper, tubing with a white stopper, rubber tubing, lancet, lancet casing, measuring instruments, slide, glass slide cover, and two (2) unidentified objects. Instrument was used to count blood cells.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments and apparatus--Hemocytometers
